title: Pondicherry Vazhiyilla Lyrics Irumbu Kuthirai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pondicherry Vazhiyilla
Singer(s):A.R.Rainhanah,Priya Hemesh
Music: G.V.Prakash kumar
Lyrics: Thamrai
Movie: Irumdbu Kuthirai

Pondicherry vazhiyilla
paathi theanja nillavula..
solli poga neeyum vandha
sokkum kaadhala.

Muthamittu mudiyala
mohanangi madiyila
kanna moodi saanjadhala
innum vidiyala..

Rathiri nerama ragalaiyagi poguthu..
verthidum vennila vaanil oorudhu..
moochula veppamo muttu katti poduthu..
metha mattum enna theduthu..

Pondicherry vazhiyilla
paathi theanja nillavula..
solli poga neeyum vandha


sokkum kaadhala.

Mundhanayil muthamitta
bathirama atha mudinju vachenea..
kannathula kannam vacha..
kannadiyil atha nottam vittenea..

Mazhaiyo... idiyo... 
vizhundha.. thithikumea..
idhayam thudikka 
engea ponayo...

pudhayal thirudum
puliya theada vittu
theada vittu kattikolveanea..

Pondicherry vazhiyilla
paathi theanja nillavula..
solli poga neeyum vandha


sokkum kaadhala.

Thoothukudi, thoovakudi
meeraasudhaar neeyum
poda munnala..

Kathiri poo, seelai katti..
kachidhama naa
vandhen pinnala

Enakkum unakkum..
pala naal bandham undu..
palakam pulakam vittu pogadhea..

Unakkum pidikkum
enna nee thooki pona 
thooki pona
dheagam thangadhey..

Pondicherry vazhiyilla
paathi theanja nillavula..
solli poga neeyum vandha
sokkum kaadhala.

Rathiri nerama ragalaiyagi pogudhu..
verthidum vennila vaanil oorudhu..
moochula veppamo muttu katti poduthu..


metha mattum enna theduthu..
